Item ID4129

Adamant boots are members-only armour pieces in Gielinor that are worn in the footwear slot of the player's inventory. The player needs at least 30 Defence to wear these armoured boots. These are the first tier of metal boots to offer a strength bonus.

As with all metal boots, this piece of armour cannot be made using the Smithing skill.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-3-1
 Defence bonuses
+10+11+12+0+0
 Other bonusesSlot
+1+0+0%+0List

[[File:Adamant boots detail.png|left|140px]]
'''Adamant boots''' are [[members|members-only]] armour pieces in ''Gielinor'' that are worn in the [[footwear slot]] of the player's [[inventory]]. The player needs at least 30 [[Defence]] to wear these armoured boots. These are the first tier of metal boots to offer a strength bonus.

As with all [[metal boots]], this piece of armour '''cannot''' be made using the [[Smithing]] [[skill]].
